author: francescobrivio
body:
#### PR description:
As this week's ORM, I took the liberty of forward-porting #37081

Change `process = cms.Process("name")` to `process = cms.Process("name", Run3)`
following suggestion at https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36947#issuecomment-1039066183
Similar to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/36959

#### PR validation:
Backport already deployed succesfully in P5 online DQM machines

#### Backport
Forward-port of #37081

FYI @pmandrik
title: [123X] Migrate DQM clients to Run3 era
